name: Overindulgence
description:
An endless runner where picking up candy will increase you multiplyer and color saturation while also slowly but surely distort your image. How long can you last?

Game was made during a 24h game jam and has thusly multiple minor bugs and close to no balance exist in the game. You will die more than in games about shaded spirits.

Team:

Ablin Larsson - Programming and gamedesign

Markus Helvinsson - Graphics and programming

Filip Andersson - Soundtrack

Gustaf Andersson - Programming
